text: Gary "Gedde" Watanabe (born June 26, 1955) is an American actor and comedian. He voiced the character, Ling, in the 1998 animated movie Mulan and its 2004 sequel, Mulan II. He played Long Duk Dong in the 1984 movie Sixteen Candles. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:Japanese comedians Category:People from Ogden, Utah
title: Gedde Watanabe
